brand.name: Luxurydine
brand.address: 1248 St Clair Ave W, Toronto, ON

hero.title: Seasonal plates, slow rituals, luminous nights.
hero.description: Luxurydine is a modern dining studio where fire, smoke, and spice are choreographed into a multi-course experience.
hero.caption: Live from the open-fire kitchen

about.title: Inspired by heritage, perfected for the present.
about.description: We blend time-honored techniques with contemporary plating, drawing from the diverse regions of India. Expect fragrant biryanis, live-fire tandoor cooking, and a cocktail program that layers spice with craft.

menu.title: Ten signature dishes, plated with intention.

items.name: Saffron Royale Biryani
items.description: Fragrant basmati, browned onions, toasted cashew.

items.name: Royal Butter Chicken
items.description: Tomato kasoori gravy, smoked cream, fenugreek.

items.name: Smoked Paneer Makhani
items.description: Charred paneer, tomato butter, chili oil.

items.name: Caviar Pani Puri
items.description: Tamarind water, whipped yogurt, oscietra pearls.

items.name: Kerala Prawn Curry
items.description: Coconut milk, curry leaf, mustard seed tempering.

items.name: Charred Tandoori Lamb
items.description: Black garlic, pomegranate glaze, mint yogurt.

items.name: Dal Dhungar
items.description: Slow-cooked lentils, ghee smoke, crisp shallots.

items.name: Malai Kofta
items.description: Cashew cream, saffron gravy, gilded nuts.

items.name: Rose Cardamom Pavlova
items.description: Berry compote, pistachio dust, rose syrup.

items.name: Mango Phirni
items.description: Chilled rice pudding, saffron milk, almond.

videos.title: Chef's Table Service
videos.description: Front-row seats to the finishing touches.

videos.title: Golden Hour Lounge
videos.description: Crafted cocktails with a light bite pairing.

booking.title: Let us host your evening.
booking.description: Share your occasion and preferences. Our team will confirm shortly.

ordering.title: Place a pickup order
ordering.description: Send your order request and we will call or email to confirm total and pickup slot.

footer.tagline: Modern Indian cuisine with candlelit elegance.
